author: Kizzi
text: Keep it in mind what has happened in the past bt there's no point to swim in it & destroy the future days https://t.co/QGGQA544UW

author: Kizzi
text:
Whosever comes in your life, ultimately you hbe to fight for yourself & hbe to learn to vibe alone 

Coz we never know where ' made in china ' is printed on the body of d pdct ...🙂

author: Kizzi
text: Yea, bt few only value us after their work is done 😓 https://t.co/nbEgaTu6zF

author: Kizzi
text:
Stop chasing behind the alluring objects  !
            ... Those are all mirages   ! 
Grab something fine & make it BEAUTIFUL !
_kizzi_🌼

author: Kizzi
text:
When u hbe d power within yourself ! 
Why to search somebody else's soul...

author: Kizzi
text:
We all want, ' that someone'
Bt very few gets it, so it's always better to be self contented rather than any fake appreciation ! (*_*)
❤️ https://t.co/GLt3za6Dol
